oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Surface-mediated solid phase reactions: Microwave assisted Arbuzov rearrangement on the solid surface
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KABOUDIN, B
BALAKRISHNA, MS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: magnesia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Microwave assisted Arbuzov rearrangement under solvent-free condition was found to be an efficient method for the preparation of dialkyl alkylphosphonates of alkyl halides. This method is an easy, rapid, and high-yielding reaction for the Arbuzov rearrangement.
